title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When previewing the report and clicking on the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the default values for the parameters should be displayed in the value boxes, allowing the user to easily modify the parameter values they want to change. However, the actual behavior is that in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog, all values are empty. This requires the user to input all values, even if they only want to modify a single parameter.
OB: When creating several report parameters and setting default values for them, dragging them to the layout.
EB: When previewing the report and clicking on the 'Show Report Parameters' button, the default values should be shown in the value boxes in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog. This will allow the user to easily modify the parameter values they want to change.
SR: 1. Create several report parameters. 2. Set default values for them. 3. Drag them to the layout. 4. Preview the report. 5. Click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
